lead_paragraph: Two hours after the Humans of New York page posted a photo of a boy expressing anxiety about his future as a gay man, Mrs. Clinton commented, “Your future is going to be amazing.”

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Reassures Gay Youth in Viral Facebook Photo

snippet: Two hours after the Humans of New York page posted a photo of a boy expressing anxiety about his future as a gay man, Mrs. Clinton commented, “Your future is going to be amazing.”
